7// Implements the class methods for ImageMtl.

10#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/ImageMtl.h"
11
12#include "common/debug.h"
13#include "libANGLE/Context.h"
14#include "libANGLE/Display.h"
15#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/ContextMtl.h"
16#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/DisplayMtl.h"
17#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/RenderBufferMtl.h"
18#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/TextureMtl.h"
19
20namespace rx
21{
22
23// TextureImageSiblingMtl implementation
24TextureImageSiblingMtl::TextureImageSiblingMtl(EGLClientBuffer buffer)
25 : mBuffer(buffer), mGLFormat(GL_NONE)
26{}
27
28TextureImageSiblingMtl::~TextureImageSiblingMtl() {}
29
30// Static
31bool TextureImageSiblingMtl::ValidateClientBuffer(const DisplayMtl *display, EGLClientBuffer buffer)
32{
33 id<MTLTexture> texture = (__bridge id<MTLTexture>)(buffer);
34 if (!texture || texture.device != display->getMetalDevice())
35 {
36 return false;
37 }
38
39 if (texture.textureType != MTLTextureType2D && texture.textureType != MTLTextureTypeCube)
40 {
41 return false;
42 }
43
44 angle::FormatID angleFormatId = mtl::Format::MetalToAngleFormatID(texture.pixelFormat);
45 const mtl::Format &format = display->getPixelFormat(angleFormatId);
46 if (!format.valid())
47 {
48 ERR() << "Unrecognized format";
49 // Not supported
50 return false;
51 }
52
53 return true;
54}
55
56egl::Error TextureImageSiblingMtl::initialize(const egl::Display *display)
57{
58 DisplayMtl *displayMtl = mtl::GetImpl(display);
59 if (initImpl(displayMtl) != angle::Result::Continue)
60 {
61 return egl::EglBadParameter();
62 }
63
64 return egl::NoError();
65}
66
67angle::Result TextureImageSiblingMtl::initImpl(DisplayMtl *displayMtl)
68{
69 mNativeTexture = mtl::Texture::MakeFromMetal((__bridge id<MTLTexture>)(mBuffer));
70
71 angle::FormatID angleFormatId =
72 mtl::Format::MetalToAngleFormatID(mNativeTexture->pixelFormat());
73 mFormat = displayMtl->getPixelFormat(angleFormatId);
74
75 mGLFormat = gl::Format(mFormat.intendedAngleFormat().glInternalFormat);
76
77 mRenderable = mFormat.getCaps().depthRenderable || mFormat.getCaps().colorRenderable;
78
79 mTextureable = mFormat.getCaps().filterable || mFormat.hasDepthOrStencilBits();
80
81 return angle::Result::Continue;
82}
83
84void TextureImageSiblingMtl::onDestroy(const egl::Display *display)
85{
86 mNativeTexture = nullptr;
87}
88
89gl::Format TextureImageSiblingMtl::getFormat() const
90{
91 return mGLFormat;
92}
93
94bool TextureImageSiblingMtl::isRenderable(const gl::Context *context) const
95{
96 return mRenderable;
97}
98
99bool TextureImageSiblingMtl::isTexturable(const gl::Context *context) const
100{
101 return mTextureable;
102}
103
104gl::Extents TextureImageSiblingMtl::getSize() const
105{
106 return mNativeTexture ? mNativeTexture->sizeAt0() : gl::Extents(0, 0, 0);
107}
108
109size_t TextureImageSiblingMtl::getSamples() const
110{
111 uint32_t samples = mNativeTexture ? mNativeTexture->samples() : 0;
112 return samples > 1 ? samples : 0;
113}
114
115// ImageMtl implementation
116ImageMtl::ImageMtl(const egl::ImageState &state, const gl::Context *context) : ImageImpl(state) {}
117
118ImageMtl::~ImageMtl() {}
119
120void ImageMtl::onDestroy(const egl::Display *display)
121{
122 mNativeTexture = nullptr;
123}
124
125egl::Error ImageMtl::initialize(const egl::Display *display)
126{
127 if (mState.target == EGL_METAL_TEXTURE_ANGLE)
128 {
129 const TextureImageSiblingMtl *externalImageSibling =
130 GetImplAs<TextureImageSiblingMtl>(GetAs<egl::ExternalImageSibling>(mState.source));
131
132 mNativeTexture = externalImageSibling->getTexture();
133
134 switch (mNativeTexture->textureType())
135 {
136 case MTLTextureType2D:
137 mImageTextureType = gl::TextureType::_2D;
138 break;
139 case MTLTextureTypeCube:
140 mImageTextureType = gl::TextureType::CubeMap;
141 break;
142 default:
143 UNREACHABLE();
144 }
145
146 mImageLevel = 0;
147 mImageLayer = 0;
148 }
149 else
150 {
151 UNREACHABLE();
152 return egl::EglBadAccess();
153 }
154
155 return egl::NoError();
156}
157
158angle::Result ImageMtl::orphan(const gl::Context *context, egl::ImageSibling *sibling)
159{
160 if (sibling == mState.source)
161 {
162 mNativeTexture = nullptr;
163 }
164
165 return angle::Result::Continue;
166}
167
168} // namespace rx
